title: CryptoGamer1
author: CryptoGamer1
content: Hi folks our reward campaign currently running till 29/05, anyone can join if they want someevery participant will get his rewards dropped at the end of 30/05just make a new BSc wallet if you don't trust this (risk-free)if you are using metamask on BSC smart chain network you can start staking your rewards on our website: https://gamermetaverse.live/we are a team of game creators working on the gamer metaverse ecosystem where the user connects to a central city from where they can access gaming worlds through portals in and around the city the user pays an entry fee with their gmeta tokens when entering a game world, when he completes the level he gets a reward back in gmeta tokens.inside gm city they can use gmeta to buy marketplace items / digital goods also, they can stake their gmeta to get 40% APY rewards in gmgold tokens, gmgold is a rare token for level 2 buys ( special vehicles, virtual land )there was no presale and we are using our funds to keep working on the ecosystem, when we reach MVP where users can play in the gaming worlds and marketplaces are added we will set a presale in tier 1 and tier 2 where the first adopter (everyone who signs up for our reward) will be placed in tier 1 on a lower token price, essential you just wait till its running and decide if you want to buy more gmeta in the aftersale, maybe strang but we will work with an aftersale so you see what you buy and not the other way around where you buy a dream/promise. the player will use web3 login through their gmeta wallet to enter gm city and the gaming worlds follow the airdrop bot on the frontpage of the website ( telegram is needed )if you have questions feel free to ask

comments.author: CryptoGamer1
comments.body: last day of airdrop don't miss outget free tokens and start staking for gmgoldelon has his avatar ready on our platform check out the news in our telegramhttps://ibb.co/ggV193m
